issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
* Introduce some wrapper methods in ArrowBuf to reduce amount of client changes.
 * Changes were introduced as part of patch to support arrow buffers on random memory.
fields.summary: [Java] Introduce wrappers for backward compatibility for ArrowBuf changes in ARROW-3191

comments.body: The JIRA title lacked context so I changed it
